scripts.vm:provision: multipass launch --name umbrel-dev --cpus 4 --memory 8G --disk 50G --mount $PWD:/opt/umbrel-mount 23.10 && multipass exec umbrel-dev -- /opt/umbrel-mount/scripts/vm provision
scripts.vm:logs: multipass exec umbrel-dev -- journalctl --unit umbreld-production --unit umbreld --unit ui --follow --lines 100 --output cat
scripts.vm:trpc: npm run --silent vm:exec -- UMBREL_DATA_DIR=./data UMBREL_TRPC_ENDPOINT=http://localhost/trpc npm --prefix /home/ubuntu/umbrel/packages/umbreld run start -- client
